sentences.english: In the meantime, it stresses on the symmetry and balance of stagecraft that is worthy of viewer's careful appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 同時注意舞臺藝術之對稱及平衡，值得觀衆細細品味。

sentences.english: It's never too late to accept this and live it.
sentences.chinese: 接受這種經歷，細細品味，永遠都不會晚。

sentences.english: Seize every second of your life and savor it.
sentences.chinese: 抓住你生命中的每分每秒，細細品味。

sentences.english: Of course, to have tea on behalf of wine, savor the leisurely calm in the warm environment.
sentences.chinese: 當然也有以茶代酒的，細細品味平靜之中的安閒。

sentences.english: Back in the car, I recalled just walked through the scene, to savor.
sentences.chinese: 回到車旁，我回憶起剛纔走過的景，細細品味。

sentences.english: Most writers want their readers to pore over every word. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 大多數作家都希望讀者能細細品味作品中的每一個詞。
